price: 26. Waxay leeyihiin kuwa fala wanaagga (abaalgud) kan u wanaagsan (Janno) iyo wax ka zaa’id ah 11(eegista Rabbi). Boor iyo dulli midna ma daboolayo wejiyadooda. Waa kuwaa ehlu Jannada, way ku dhex waari weligood.
arabic: ۞ لِّلَّذِينَ أَحۡسَنُواْ ٱلۡحُسۡنَىٰ وَزِيَادَةٞۖ وَلَا يَرۡهَقُ وُجُوهَهُمۡ قَتَرٞ وَلَا ذِلَّةٌۚ أُوْلَٰٓئِكَ أَصۡحَٰبُ ٱلۡجَنَّةِۖ هُمۡ فِيهَا خَٰلِدُونَ
footnotes: 11. Inay arkaan Rabbigood, oo waxa ugu sarreeya ah ay ku helayaan Jannada.

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: lilladhīna aḥsanū al-ḥus'nā waziyādatun walā yarhaqu wujūhahum qatarun walā dhillatun ulāika aṣḥābu al-janati hum fīhā khālidūna
